statements: DELETE FROM virtual_agents WHERE agent_id = 10 AND access_level < 5;
DELETE FROM virtual_agents WHERE agent_type = 'Admin' AND last_interaction < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM agents WHERE agent_id = 100 AND access_level > 5
DELETE FROM queries WHERE response_text LIKE '%error%'
DELETE FROM queries WHERE agent_id = 5 OR query_id IN (SELECT query_id FROM log_history);
DELETE FROM queries WHERE query_text LIKE '%important%' AND agent_id = 5;
